segments.text: Look at that woman, just standing there drying dishes while her kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so oblivious, not even noticing the water pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And her kids are being so naughty, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless she's being, not paying attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and she just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, not caring about the mess or the kids' safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's so focused on that dish, nothing else seems to matter to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon, before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just ridiculous; someone needs to do something about this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I might have to step in and help, even if it's not my place.
segments.speaker: PAR
